command.name: Evaluate
command.description: Evaluate any piece of code in any language with optional input and command line arguments.

language.name: Language
language.placeholder: Enter the language to execute in...
language.unknown: I could not find a language that I support with that name. Please try again.

file.name: File
file.description: The file to load the code from.

input.name: Input
input.description: The input to provide to the program.
input.placeholder: Enter the input to provide to the program...

args.name: Arguments
args.description: Additional command line arguments to provide to the program.

output.name: Output
output.empty: No output was produced, ensure something was printed to the console.
output.pastebin: The output was too large to display, so it has been uploaded to a [pastebin]({url}).

unauthorised: This is not your evaluation, you'll need to create your own using the 'evaluate' command.
